definition: (of a machine) to stop/to shut down/to park a plane/to finish shooting (a TV program etc)/to suspend a phone line/(of a prepaid mobile phone) to be out of credit

sentences.english: I let the plane down gently, pulled off the runway, and taxied back to parking.
sentences.chinese: 我稳稳地降落了飞机，驶离跑道，滑行回了停机场。

sentences.english: Three helipads are on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 大厦顶部有三个直升机停机坪。

sentences.english: This type of equipment are generally long-running, or even a long non-stop machine.
sentences.chinese: 这类设备一般都是长时间运行，甚至很久不停机。

sentences.english: There were three jumbos on the concrete apron.
sentences.chinese: 水泥停机坪上有三架巨型飞机。

sentences.english: Twelve enemy transport aircraft on the handstand were knocked out by mortar shells.
sentences.chinese: 停机坪上的十二架敌方运输机被迫击炮弹击毁了。

sentences.english: Positioned stop function, without sticking knife or wasting film.
sentences.chinese: 定位停机功能，不粘刀，不浪费包装膜。

sentences.english: If take expected downtime, easy cause parts damaged.
sentences.chinese: 如果带料停机，很容易造成机件损坏。
甚至感觉不到停机时间？

sentences.english: Army that stands guard is face to outside and seems not to have a bit of suspects.
sentences.chinese: 站岗的军卫仍面朝停机坪外面，看来一点怀疑也没有。

sentences.english: A delegation from AIESEC visits the airport apron.
sentences.chinese: AIESEC代表团参观机场停机坪。

sentences.english: XXX, Ramp Control , there is some fuel slick near stand 3, please handle it.
sentences.chinese: 现场，3号停机位附近有漏油，请处理一下。

sentences.english: The mosaic pattern on an owl butterfly egg looks like a landing pad.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰蝶卵上嵌花式图案看上去好像停机坪。

sentences.english: Stepless speed regulation, and the sealing mould have open after stop running.
sentences.chinese: 无级调速，停机后热封模具自动处于张开状态。

sentences.english: Targeted recoveries are efficient in that they minimize downtime.
sentences.chinese: 通过最小化停机时间，来提高恢复效率。

sentences.english: When during maintenance, the server will be down no more than 48 hours.
sentences.chinese: 维护期间，伺服器将停机不多于48小时。

sentences.english: High-end servers may also allow hot insertion to reduce downtimes.
sentences.chinese: 高端服务器也可允许热插入以降低停机时间。

definition: to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
to be in arrears/to be out of credit/amount owing
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to start an engine/to boot up (a computer)/to press Ctrl-Alt-Delete/to begin shooting a film or TV show
to replace a lost or damaged SIM card, retaining one's original telephone number/SIM replacement
to report the loss of something
to relocate a piece of equipment (air conditioner etc)
